articles.author: Joshua Partlow
articles.title: Biden administration review of Colorado River highlights tough choices - The Washington Post
articles.description: The federal review lays out the painful choices facing the American West after a two-decade drought and chronic overuse have left crucial lakes — the water supply for tens of millions of people — dangerously diminished.
